Ingredients:
3 cups frozen watermelon, cut into cubes or small slices
1 cup frozen strawberries
2 cups unsweetened almond milk
1/2 cup coconut or soy yogurt
juice of one lime

Instructions:
Juice the lime.Â 
Place all of the ingredients in a blender.Â 
Blend until smooth. Use the pulse function a couple of times. If you want a thinner smoothie, add more almond milk or a bit of water.Â
